definition: to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Are you going to print this?, he asks with worry.
sentences.chinese: 你會刊印這？他擔心地問。

sentences.english: Whether the story will be published in print or online may also affect your writing.
sentences.chinese: 文章是以刊印版還是網絡版發表，也會影響你的寫作。

sentences.english: The newspaper printed disturbing photos of the crime scene.
sentences.chinese: 這份報紙刊印了駭人的犯罪現場照片。

sentences.english: Until recent times, airline companies used to publish air timetables .
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，航空公司才停止刊印航空時刻表。

sentences.english: At the end of Ming dynasty, records of vocal music are spreaded abroad to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 明末的唱樂記錄還流傳到日本刊印成書。

definition: to go to press/to submit for printing
manuscript copy of a book (before the printing press)
